For a formal job interview
column5: it's best to opt for a hairstyle that exudes professionalism and confidence. For women
column9: keeping hair away from the face to maintain a polished look. Men should consider a classic short haircut
column10: ensuring it's well-groomed and styled to avoid any unkempt appearance. Facial hair
column12: should be trimmed and neat. It's important to avoid overly trendy or distracting hairstyles that may draw attention away from your qualifications.
